document_data.name: North Way
document_data.mainbody: '''North Way''' was a main thoroughfare in the city of [[Khôltar]] in [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|67}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 53: Khôltar, Part 4, Our Tour Begins}}
document_data.History: This street was named simply for the compass direction.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|85-86}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 65: Khôltar, Part 16, A Brief History of Khôltar, Part 3}}
document_data.Notable Locations:
Locations on North Way included:
* [[Baharrokhbrur]]: Klathlaaedin (sculpted mansion) of the [[Khaundrove]] family.
* [[Darvoro's Plates]]: Sold metal plates and plaques of all types.
* [[Harhallo's Warmhearth House]]: Old inn for those not wanting to pay for luxury.
* [[Harmeirlarko's Journeys]]: Wagon repair shop.
* [[Jamrado's Thanetalium]]: Theater for the (usually ribald) performing arts.
* [[Munsrum's Ready Ladle]]: Busy, popular blurdren (food counter).
* [[Oraundro Nempeth's]]: Sold rope, twine, wire, chain, and rings to which they could fasten.
* [[Pauntraal]]: Duty house and gauthraun (police) barracks for Farrgaunlar.
* [[Surlpar's Stews]]: Busy, low-cost blurdren.
* [[Turthtraal]]: Twin duty houses, jail, armory, and garthraun offices at Handrornlar.
